Very excellent first person shooter game.

This game is by-far the most competitive FPS eSport, and can only cost you at most $14.99.

NOTICE: This game is free to play. However, it is also free to play for any new accounts that cheaters have made. For that reason, if you do not have a good standing with the Steam Community (Years of service, levels, etc.) I HIGHLY recommend the Prime Status Upgrade.

I mean it's CS:GO. If you like fps and very competitive games, then thsi game is for you. The only thing that could turn you off is the toxic players that you sometimes play with in ranked. But pretty much everybody dealt with that a couple of times now so we can deal with that. I like the game it's fun and you should try it out.
